title: The aftermath: Dan Balz, Amy Walter and Eddie Glaude, Jr.
description: Dan Balz, Washington Post Chief Correspondent, Amy Walter, National Editor for the Cook Political Report, and Eddie Glaude, Jr. Princeton professor, talk to Chuck Todd about the attack on the Capitol and the president's role in stoking violence.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
